channel.title: How can i change value of items?
channel.description: Would someone tell me how i can change the value of an item, such as a skillcape, to a certin price. So that in the shops it sells for 1mil?

item.title: How can i change value of items?
item.dc:creator: @doodooss doodooss
item.description:
@doodooss wrote:

go to item.cfg and find the id number
and change the first 3 numbers after the description
first number is shop price secound is low alc price third
is high alc price

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change value of items?
